posts.post_content:
Please send me an email with scans and asking prices.  If you've got any other pre-1917 signed cards, I'd be interested, too. 

Email [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking.  Here's a scan of one of my favorites for inspiration....
